attributes.action: Introducelntroducethe right to free internet as a Human Right and to install a government funded wifi network Nationwide
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In Estonia the right to free internet is a human right and there are over huge amounts of free, government funded, wireless internet hotspots in the country. Almost everywhere you go you can access the internet. Here in England, in the borough of City of London there is 'The Cloud' network giving hundreds, thousands of people internet. However, that is only one borough of only one city and this is a petition to introduce a free, wireless internet network throughout the country and make the right to free internet a Human Right by using Estonian legislature.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
